options.name: Eye of the Bull
options.description: Affects both Shooting and Standard Melee Attacks. Att is always 1, Str is always 5, and AP is always 10. Hits automatically (no to-hit roll required). Multiple Wounds(2, Melee).

options.name: Onyx Core
options.description: Str is always 6. Flaming Attacks, Multiple Wounds(D3, towards Weakness(Flaming Attacks)).

options.name: Banner of the Twice-Branded
options.description: Models in the bearer's unit gain Shoot in Extra Rank.

options.name: Their Master's Banner
options.description:
Apply the following effects while the bearer's unit is within range of a friendly model's Commanding Presence:
  • Model parts with Vassal gain Fury.
  • The bearer's unit must reroll failed Charge Range rolls in the Charge Phase.

options.name: Banner of Shamut
options.description: Models in the bearer's unit gain +1 Off. The bearer's unit gain +1 Combat Score.

options.name: Blaze of Protection
options.description: Arm is set to 6. At the end of Agility Step 0, each enemy model in contact with the bearer's model that could have allocated attacks towards it, but chose not to, suffers 1 hit with Str 4, AP 0, Magical Attacks, and Flaming Attacks.

options.name: Kadim Binding
options.description: Aegis(+1, against Flaming Attacks, max. 3+), , Hand-and-a-Half.

options.name: Breath of the Brass Bull
options.description: The bearer's model gains +1 HP and First Strike(Grind Attack(X, Magical Attacks, Toxic Attacks)). X is equal to the number of models in contact with the bearer's unit's Front Facing.

options.name: Golden Idol of Shamut
options.description: If the bearer's model is Height 1 it gains Ghost Step, its Cha is set to 4" and its Mob is set to 6". In addition, the bearer can cast Flaming Swords (Pyromancy) as a Bound Spell(3+).

options.name: Mask of Ages
options.description: The wearer gains Aegis(5+, against Grind Attack, Impact Hits, Magical Attacks, and Stomp Attack), Terror, Hatred.

options.name: Lugar's Dice
options.description: A single model part of the bearer's model can reroll a single failed to-hit, to-wound, or Armour Save roll per Player Turn. This cannot be used for Crush Attacks.

options.name: Ring of Desiccation
options.description: When Choosing Equipment and Abilities at the start of a Round of Combat, each enemy unit in contact with the wearer's model gains one Incendiary Marker.

options.name: Tablet of Vezodinezh
options.description: When the bearer attempts to cast a Learned Spell using four or more Magic Dice, treat a single rolled ‘1’ or ‘2’ as a natural ‘3’.
